00017 package WeBWorK::Cookie;
00018 
00019 =head1 NAME
00020 
00021 WeBWorK::Cookie - inherit from either Apache::Cookie or Apache2::Cookie
00022 depending on mod_perl version.
00023 
00024 =head1 SYNOPSIS
00025 
00026 Given C<$r>, a WeBWorK::Request object
00027 
00028  my $cookie = new WeBWorK::Cookie
00029 
00030 =cut
00031 
00032 use strict;
00033 use warnings;
00034 
00035 use mod_perl;
00036 use constant MP2 => ( exists $ENV{MOD_PERL_API_VERSION} and $ENV{MOD_PERL_API_VERSION} >= 2 );
00037 
00038 # This class inherits from Apache::Cookie under mod_perl and Apache2::Cookie under mod_perl2
00039 BEGIN {
00040     if (MP2) {
00041         require Apache2::Cookie;
00042         require APR::Request::Error;
00043         Apache2::Cookie->import;
00044         push @WeBWorK::Cookie::ISA, "Apache2::Cookie";
00045     } else {
00046         require Apache::Cookie;
00047         Apache::Cookie->import;
00048         push @WeBWorK::Cookie::ISA, "Apache::Cookie";
00049     }
00050 }
00051 
00052 1;
